text: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: If I find 10,000 ways something won't work, I haven't failed. I am not discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
author: Thomas Edison

text: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: Never complain and never explain.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
author: Pauline Kael

text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

text: Meditate â€¦ do not delay, lest you later regret it.
author: The Buddha

text: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: You yourself must strive. The Buddhas only point the way.
author: The Buddha

text: A wise person should be urgently moved on occasions that make for urgency.
author: The Buddha

text: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Robert Schuller

text: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
author: Thomas Edison

text: Should someone do good, let them do it again and again. They should develop this habit, for the accumulation of goodness brings joy.
author: The Buddha

text: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

text: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
author: Thomas Edison

text: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

text: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
author: William Blake

text: Genius is one per cent inspiration, ninety-nine per cent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

text: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
author: Ken Venturi

text: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

text: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
author: George S. Patton

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H. G. Wells

text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

text: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.
author: Liberace

text: Ardently do today what must be done. Who knows? Tomorrow, death comes.
author: The Buddha

text: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
author: Plato

text: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them.
author: Tony Robbins

text: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

text: Before you can inspire with emotion, you must be swamped with it yourself. Before you can move their tears, your own must flow. To convince them, you must yourself believe.
author: Winston Churchill

text: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
author: Tony Robbins

text: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Whatever happens, take responsibility.
author: Tony Robbins

text: You always succeed in producing a result.
author: Tony Robbins

text: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
author: Tony Robbins

text: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

text: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more
author: Tony Robbins

text: The way we communicate with others and with ourselves ultimately determines the quality of our lives.
author: Tony Robbins

text: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
author: Tony Robbins

text: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.
author: Tony Robbins
